definition: to show/to take out and show to others/to display

to go out/to come out/to occur/to produce/to go beyond/to rise/to put forth/to happen/(used after a verb to indicate an outward direction or a positive result)/classifier for dramas, plays, operas etc
variant of 出[chu1] (classifier for plays or chapters of classical novels)

sentences.english: Hello. This is the Yanhua Fenghuang Hospital. May I see your passport please.
sentences.chinese: 您好，这里是燕化凤凰医院，请出示您的护照。

sentences.english: Please present identifications to purchase concession tickets.
sentences.chinese: 购买优待票请出示证件。

sentences.english: May I have your passport and arrival card, please?
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的护照和入境卡？

sentences.english: Please show me your passport and your health certificate.
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的护照和健康证。

sentences.english: Participant(s) who fail to produce valid identity documents will not be permitted to participate in the race.
sentences.chinese: 未能出示有效身份证明文件的参赛者，不得出赛。

sentences.english: Please show us your card so we can identify whether it is one of them.
sentences.chinese: 请出示您的信用卡，我们来识别是否属于白金卡系列。

sentences.english: Then the lovely young mother showed the signet ring as proof.
sentences.chinese: 这位年轻又迷人的母亲当众出示了图章戒指以作证明。

sentences.english: Rearrange the sentences in the story. Story 1.
sentences.chinese: 出示故事中的不按挨次胪列的句子。

sentences.english: Reach down and Show us three.
Businesses might inquire interns to receive college credit for their experience.
sentences.chinese: 有些公司会要求实习生出示学校给的信用证明。

sentences.english: To use the Internet you must show a valid I. D.
sentences.chinese: 如果你想上网，必须要出示有效的身份证件。

sentences.english: The HA will issue a certificate to non-local women after their bookings are confirmed.
sentences.chinese: 确认预订后，医院行政机关会出示一份证明。

sentences.english: Please scan your Student ID Card when you enter the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 学生进入宿舍时，须出示学生证。

sentences.english: Roh left a suicide note for his family that family lawyer Moon Jae-in handed out to South Korean media.
sentences.chinese: 卢的家庭律师向媒体出示了其自杀前的遗言。

sentences.english: The lawyer confuted the testimony of the witness by showing actual photographs of the accident.
sentences.chinese: 律师出示那次事故的真实照片，驳倒了证人的证言。

sentences.english: They showed respondents three unlabeled pie charts.
sentences.chinese: 他们向被调查者出示了三张不带标签的饼状图。

definition: to submit (a report etc)/to refer (a problem) to sb
to present/to give/to hand over/to hand in/to lay before
